TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {197020=Dabur India is in the Personal Care sector. The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 51,334.29 crore. The company management includes Anand C Burman - Chairman, Amit Burman - Vice Chairman, Mohit Burman - Director, Saket Burman - Director, P D Narang - Director, Sunil Duggal - Director, P N Vijay - Director, R C Bhargava - Director, S Narayan - Director, Ajay Dua - Director, Sanjay Kumar Bhattacharyya - Director, Falguni Sanjay Nayar - Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 500096 and the NSE with an NSE Code of DABUR. Its Registered office is at 8/3, Asaf Ali Road , New Delhi,Delhi - 110002. Their Registrars are Karvy Computershare Private Ltd., 134550=JSWSteel Jul Fut, 133843=UnitedBrewerie Jul Fut, 133332=28 July 2015, 195713=Zensar Technologies Recommended on Mar 24th 2015}
